title: Social Media Hero!

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, select a player. You'll expose them for their real crimes and how you'll be the one to put a stop to their crimes! People can choose to like your post (won't be public). You'll learn how many likes you got at the end of the day.
- Woah, that's a lot more than you expected. If you got at least three likes, you'll be forced to Basic attack the player you selected. For each like past the third, your attack tier is raised by one. If you got five likes, you will bypass protective effects.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - After winning the game, you'll quit social media and leave the Town.

desc:
Post 3601
*Don't worry, I'll save everyone! Hehe, this is going to get so many likes...*
